short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Randomly generated colour palette which lets you copy colour code hex values quickly

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Looking for some sort of a colour theme to kick start your project? Then Hexahex is just the right extension for you!
A quick way to get a randomly generated colour palette, which lets users copy a desired hex code value from 6 vivid colours with just one click. So, whenever a user is looking for some inspiration and wants to mix and match some colours, this extension will enable the user to do the same and copy any of the displayed colour values, by just clicking on the colour tile.

Find the code here - https://github.com/DemonDaddy22/Hexahex
